title: Encouraging Spiritual Growth in Your Kids
itunes:author: Guest: Heidi St. John
itunes:summary:
Spending time with God can be difficult when your kids require so much attention. John and Danny offer some ideas for how to spend time with the Lord amidst the busyness of parenting.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Heidi St. John's book "Becoming MomStrong" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-09-21?refcd=1143802

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/encouraging-spiritual-growth-in-your-kids/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
